article.title: Welcome to the St. Louis U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the St. Louis U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

USA TODAY article features small Missouri business new to exporting​

________________________________________________________________

The U.S. Commercial Service, part of the U.S. Department of Commerce, provides export assistance to U.S. companies who are developing international markets. If you are new to exporting or looking to increase current exports, our experienced staff will help you through every step of the process. Call the St. Louis Export Assistance Center today for help to:

  • Find new markets
  • Navigate documentation challenges
  • Identify and evaluate international partners
  • Create market entry strategies
  • Explore exporting for the first time

Download the free 76-pageInternational E-Commerce Sales Guide

What People are Saying About the Commercial Service

Watch avideo overviewof the Commercial Service on KSDK.

Listen to anNPR reporton the ways the Commercial Service helps exporters.

Read a White House progress report on theNational Export Initiative(Sept. 2010).

The St. Louis office serves Missouri (except Kansas City) and the Illinois counties around St. Louis. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please visit ourservicespage.

Visit our newest resource; theExport Webinar LibraryListen to expert speakers address opportunities in specific countries or targeted industries, documentation, finance, regulations and more.​​
